column1: The  above-named  Accused-Appellant  (hereinafter  after  referred  to  as  the
Appellant) along with 1st Accused mentioned in the indictment were indicted
by the Attorney General in the High Court of Embilipitiya as follows:

column2: 1.  The 2nd Accused being a member of an unlawful assembly with persons
